name: tinyorm
description: Modern C++ ORM library for Qt framework
supports: !(uwp | arm | android | emscripten | osx | ios | xbox | freebsd | openbsd | wasm32)

sql-mysql.description: Build Qt SQL Driver for MySQL

sql-psql.description: Build Qt SQL Driver for PostgreSQL

sql-sqlite.description: Build Qt SQL Driver for SQLite

disable-thread-local.description: Remove all thread_local storage duration specifiers (disables multi-threading support)

inline-constants.description: Use inline constants instead of extern constants in shared builds

mysql-ping.description: Install MySQL C client library (libmysql) to support the mysql_ping()

orm.description: Enable ORM-related source code (without it only the query builder is compiled)

strict-mode.description: Propagate strict compiler/linker options and Qt definitions
